overview:
Matthew Cordio is a Marketing Professional who has experience in crafting marketing strategy for Health IT and Professional Services firms.

Currently Cordio serves in a marketing and business development role at VitalHealth Software USA. He helps craft sales and marketing strategy for the company’s entry into the US healthcare IT market. Cordio is also involved in a marketing role at Answerport, Inc a highly regarded Management & Technology consulting firm based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

Prior to his career in marketing Cordio spent a couple of years in the retail industry as a manager.

Cordio attends Marquette University in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

degrees.degree_type: Bachelors of Science in Business Administration
degrees.subject: Entrepreneurship
